definitions.text: a bag filled with sand; used as a weapon or to build walls or as ballast
compel by coercion, threats, or crude means
examples: They sandbagged him to make dinner for everyone

definitions.text: hit something or somebody as if with a sandbag
downplay one's ability (towards others) in a game in order to deceive, as in gambling
protect or strengthen with sandbags; stop up
examples: The residents sandbagged the beach front
